author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/lock.c

continuing the work begun in revision 4599.

author: kfogel
msg: Update cvs2svn for revision 4570.
Patch by: Chia-liang Kao <clkao@clkao.org>

Replace calls to svn_stream_from_stdio with svn_stream_from_aprfile.

author: sussman
msg: Continue issue #724 (libsvn_auth):  bugfix.
* auth.c (svn_auth_save_credentials): oops, remember that iter_baton
could be NULL.  :-)

author: sussman
msg: Continue issue #724 (libsvn_auth): make ra_dav use the new auth system!
Also, tweak the svn_auth.h 'save' API, so that the auth_baton
automatically remembers and saves the last set of credentials it
returned.  (It's ridiculous to force every caller to cache the
successful creds.)
[Mike Pilato will soon fix our provider implementations, so that both
providers share a common save function.  That means
svn_auth_save_credentials can stop looping over every provider, and
just ask the *one* provider (which produced the creds) to save.]
* sorts.c (apr_array_prepend):  um, dst is before src.  :-)
* svn_auth.h, auth.c (struct svn_auth_iterstate_t): add cache field,
so the iter baton can "remember" the last set of creds returned to
the caller.
(svn_auth_first_credentials, svn_auth_next_credentials): remember
the creds in iter_baton.
(svn_auth_save_credentials): change API to take an iter_baton
instead of credentials.  Save the last set of credentials cached in
the iter_baton.
* ra_dav.h (svn_ra_session_t):  add an auth_iterstate baton to the
main RA session object.
* session.c (request_auth):  total rewrite.  grab creds from the new
auth_baton object.
* util.c (svn_ra_dav__maybe_store_auth_info): total rewrite.  store
credentials using the new svn_auth.h API.
* build.conf [libsvn_ra_dav]:  now depends on libsvn_auth.

author: brane
msg: Working on issue 872. Build the apr-iconv conversion modules to give
apr_xlate fighting chance.
* subversion.dsw: Added projects apriconv_ccs_modules and apriconv_ces_modules.
Incidentally, add libsvn_auth to the dependencies of svnversion.
